title: Pixel 3a, trying to call forward I getthe Errors both Call settings error & Network or sim card err
content:
Pixel 3a, trying to call forward I get the Errors both Call settings error & Network or sim card error.
I've tried going through the phone's app menus, and MMI code like **21#[forwarded number]#  and other variations of of these codes.
  Maybe I have missed one? Please suggest a different one.
  I see from googling this problem that the Pixel 3a may have a problem with this?
  Does any one out there with a pixel 3a able to make call forwarding work?
Keith
